net.jforum.util.mail

Class IdentifiableMimeMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Message
      • javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage
        • net.jforum.util.mail.IdentifiableMimeMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.mail.internet.MimePart, javax.mail.Part

    public class IdentifiableMimeMessage
extends javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage
    A MimeMessage implementation where it's possible to correctly set the Message-ID header.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil
